name: Avalanche Tetris
description:
Avalanche Tetris

A combination of Tetris and 3's/2048.

Instructions: Use arrow keys to move bricks in that direction.

The score is the number of lines filled by the bricks. Clears the bricks (color turns orange) when all the dots in the row/column are filled.

From Tetris:

  • ☑ Shapes
  • ☑ Line Clear, clears all the shapes along the way, not just the dots in the brick
  • ☒ Score


From 3's/2048:

  • ☑ New shape onto the grid
  • ☑ One step at a time
  • ☒ Fall down
  • ☒ Merging

Note: Made the game in three days, when my team got disbanded suddenly. Hence lacking polish.

Tetris + 3's/2048

  • Turn the Brick based on the collision of one shape to a fixed body

Source: https://github.com/azarmadr/avalanche-tetris

Github Pages: https://azarmadr.github.io/avalanche-tetris/
